user.biography:
💕Sharing the best recycled crafts and activities for kids! 
🖐🏼Tag #recycleandplay and follow hosts @mothercould and @hellowonderful_co to be featured.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Recycle And Play on August 01, 2021 tagging @_simply_bea_. May be an image of fruit.

node.text:
Watermelon counting puzzle perfect for summer 🍉. Lovely idea by  @_simply_bea_ 🤗. Find all the details on her page! 
•
Tag us @recycleandplay and use the hashtag #recycleandplay for a chance to feature your recycled craft, art or activity! (xx Myriam, @mothercould)
.
.
.
#montessori #preschool #crafty #kidsactivities #homeschoolingideas #earlylearning #learningthroughplay #invitationtoplay #preschooler #cardboard taft #toddler #toddlerfun #homeschoolpreschool #homeschool #everydayplayhacks #playathome #montessoriathome #letthekids #letthemplay #babyplay #childhoodunplugged #kidsplay #toddleractivities #diy  #playbasedlearning #busytoddler

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Recycle And Play on July 30, 2021 tagging @craftedbybears.

node.text:
You must watch @craftedbybears create this lion! Loved this cardboard creation 🦁. Find all the details on their page ❤️. 
•
Tag us @recycleandplay and use the hashtag #recycleandplay for a chance to feature your recycled craft, art or activity! (xx Myriam, @mothercould)
.
.
.

node.text:
TUBES OF EMOTION 🤪🌈 a wonderful way to talk to kids about feelings! Creative experiment and idea by @mothercould. Check out her feed for all the details 💕

Tag us @recycleandplay and use the hashtag #recycleandplay for a chance to feature your recycled craft, art or activity! (xx Agnes, @hellowonderful_co )
.
.
.
.
.
#motherhood #parenting #preschoolathome #learningthroughplay #earlylearning #invitationtoplay #toddleractivities #kidsactivities #sahm #ece #montessori #prek 
#montessori #diy #busytoddler  #toddlerlife #sahmlife #toddlerfun #homeschool #everydayplayhacks #playathome #montessoriathome #toddler #sensoryplay

Tag us @recycleandplay and use the hashtag #recycleandplay for a chance to feature your recycled craft, art or activity! (xx Agnes, @hellowonderful_co )

node.text:
These paper roll cactus are adorable!! Such and easy and fun idea by  @hellowonderful_co 😍. Find all the details on her page 🌵. 
•
Tag us @recycleandplay and use the hashtag #recycleandplay for a chance to feature your recycled craft, art or activity! (xx Myriam, @mothercould)
.
.

node.text:
Ice Castles 🏰 💦 What a fantastic way to reuse old toys! Love this super fun summer idea by @mothercould ☀️

Tag us @recycleandplay and use the hashtag #recycleandplay for a chance to feature your recycled craft, art or activity! (xx Agnes, @hellowonderful_co )
.
